title: (x) Schering: monolinear sans / Any ideas for this font? - Schering Sans {Viktor Nübel}
content:
Hello!  
I need help to identify this font. Word "medic" is cropped srom Schering's slogan ("making medicine work")  
Any help is appreciated.  
Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307101004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/medic_5361.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307101004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schering_4247.jpg)

EDIT: Sorry for the images :)
author: ralevr

comments.content:
But make sure the image is either the font  
or something really really nice to look at.

hhp

As far as I know it’s a custom font done by Alessio Leonardi. You will find it on his website [http://www.alessio.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307101004/http:/www.alessio.de/ "http://www.alessio.de/")
That’s correct. Its name is [Schering Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307101004/http:/www.alessio.de/fonts/schriftmuster/schsanreg.html) (who would have guessed?)

Thank you very much for the answers!  
My best wishes to all of you!
